content: Has anyone used the FIRELY Forge tool and can give me a highlevel explanation of what it does?

Hi @Kesara Liyanage, Forge is a Windows desktop application for authoring FHIR profiles with a user-friendly graphical interface.
You can download Forge for free from https://simplifier.net
Here is a link to online documentation:
http://docs.simplifier.net/forge/index.html
Hope this helps!
Cheers, Michel (the author of Forge ;)
Just be aware that Forge doesn't yet support working with R4 resources. That should be available sometime in the spring once R4 is officially locked down.
